00020 
00021 #ifndef _COORD_H
00022 #define _COORD_H
00023 
00024 #include <omnetpp.h>
00025 #include "MiXiMDefs.h"
00026 #include "FWMath.h"
00027 
00028 
00037 class MIXIM_API Coord : public cObject
00038 {
00039 public:
00041   static const Coord ZERO;
00042 
00043 public:
00046     double x;
00047     double y;
00048     double z;
00051 public:
00053     Coord()
00054         : x(0.0), y(0.0), z(0.0) {}
00055 
00057     Coord(double x, double y, double z = 0.0)
00058         : x(x), y(y), z(z) {}
00059 
00061     Coord( const Coord& pos )
00062         : cObject(pos), x(pos.x), y(pos.y), z(pos.z) {}
00063 
00065     Coord( const Coord* pos )
00066         : cObject(*pos), x(pos->x), y(pos->y), z(pos->z) {}
00067 
00069     std::string info() const {
00070         std::stringstream os;
00071         os << "(" << x << "," << y << "," << z << ")";
00072         return os.str();
00073     }
00074 
00076     friend Coord operator+(const Coord& a, const Coord& b) {
00077         Coord tmp = a;
00078         tmp += b;
00079         return tmp;
00080     }
00081 
00083     friend Coord operator-(const Coord& a, const Coord& b) {
00084         Coord tmp = a;
00085         tmp -= b;
00086         return tmp;
00087     }
00088 
00090     friend Coord operator*(const Coord& a, double f) {
00091     Coord tmp = a;
00092     tmp *= f;
00093         return tmp;
00094     }
00095 
00097     friend Coord operator/(const Coord& a, double f) {
00098     Coord tmp = a;
00099     tmp /= f;
00100         return tmp;
00101     }
00102 
00106     Coord& operator*=(double f) {
00107         x *= f;
00108         y *= f;
00109         z *= f;
00110         return *this;
00111     }
00112 
00116     Coord& operator/=(double f) {
00117         x /= f;
00118         y /= f;
00119         z /= f;
00120         return *this;
00121     }
00122 
00126     Coord& operator+=(const Coord& a) {
00127         x += a.x;
00128         y += a.y;
00129         z += a.z;
00130         return *this;
00131     }
00132 
00138     Coord& operator=(const Coord& a) {
00139         x = a.x;
00140         y = a.y;
00141         z = a.z;
00142         return *this;
00143     }
00144 
00148     Coord& operator-=(const Coord& a) {
00149         x -= a.x;
00150         y -= a.y;
00151         z -= a.z;
00152         return *this;
00153     }
00154 
00161     friend bool operator==(const Coord& a, const Coord& b) {
00162         // FIXME: this implementation is not transitive
00163         return FWMath::close(a.x, b.x) && FWMath::close(a.y, b.y) && FWMath::close(a.z, b.z);
00164     }
00165 
00171     friend bool operator!=(const Coord& a, const Coord& b) {
00172         return !(a==b);
00173     }
00174 
00178     double distance( const Coord& a ) const {
00179         Coord dist=*this-a;
00180         return dist.length();
00181     }
00182 
00186     double sqrdist( const Coord& a ) const {
00187         Coord dist=*this-a;
00188         return dist.squareLength();
00189     }
00190 
00194     double sqrTorusDist(const Coord& b, const Coord& size) const;
00195 
00199     double squareLength() const
00200     {
00201         return x * x + y * y + z * z;
00202     }
00203 
00207     double length() const
00208     {
00209         return sqrt(squareLength());
00210     }
00211 
00218      bool isInBoundary(const Coord& lowerBound, const Coord& upperBound) const {
00219         return  lowerBound.x <= x && x <= upperBound.x &&
00220                 lowerBound.y <= y && y <= upperBound.y &&
00221                 lowerBound.z <= z && z <= upperBound.z;
00222      }
00223 
00227     Coord min(const Coord& a) const {
00228         return Coord(this->x < a.x ? this->x : a.x,
00229                      this->y < a.y ? this->y : a.y,
00230                      this->z < a.z ? this->z : a.z);
00231     }
00232 
00236     Coord max(const Coord& a) const {
00237         return Coord(this->x > a.x ? this->x : a.x,
00238                      this->y > a.y ? this->y : a.y,
00239                      this->z > a.z ? this->z : a.z);
00240     }
00241 };
00242 
00243 
00244 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const Coord& coord)
00245 {
00246     return os << "(" << coord.x << "," << coord.y << "," << coord.z << ")";
00247 }
00248 
00249 #endif
